task.title: Miswired Connections
task.shortdesc: Correct wiring errors where the hot wire is accidentally soldered to ground or lugs are mixed up on the pots or jack.

context.p: Miswired connections occur when wires are soldered to incorrect lugs. This results in weak or no sound from the circuit.

taskbody.result: If sound is restored, the problem was miswired connections.
